segments.text: A :: You must be Wily . It's nice to meet you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: B :: Nice to meet you , Mr . Wilson .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A :: Tim , please . Please be seated .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A :: So , Wily , you have been with IBM for two years , ready for change ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: B :: Well , I think I'm ready for new challenges .
segments.speaker: S2
